heading: ***WINTER WEATHER ADVISORIES FOR ALL AREAS EXCEPT THE SOUTHERN CHAMPLAIN AND HUDSON VALLEYS, AND SOUTHEAST VT LATER TODAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING***Today
text: Periods of morning sun giving way to clouds west to east. Snow developing in the St. Lawrence and northern NY mid-afternoon, reaching I-89 by dark. Up to 3 inches in NY. Highs in the 20s to low 30s. Light winds, turning to the south and southeast 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of snow, briefly moderate to heavy, tapering to snow showers. Totals 3 to 6 inches, locally near 2 inches in some valleys. Lows in the teens to around 20. Winds south to southeast near 10 mph, becoming light.

heading: Wednesday
text: Snow showers ending south, and diminishing north. Breaks of sun developing in southern valleys. Highs in the mid 20s to mid 30s, warmest in southern valleys. Winds light, becoming northwest near 10 mph.
